GPUBindGroupLayoutLabel.summary:
The label property of the
interface provides a label that can be used to identify the object, for example in messages or console warnings.

remarks.para: This can be set by providing a label property in the descriptor object passed into the originating call, or you can get and set it directly on the GPUBindGroupLayout object.

GPUBindGroupLayoutLabel.value: A string. If this has not been previously set as described above, it will be an empty string.
